location: Level 8 Jade District and maintenance tunnels

knows: SSS raided Level 8 at dawn with 60+ officers
Arrest warrants issued for 47 people in his operation
Thousands of residents fought SSS for six hours
47 people died in the riot including Mrs. Huang and Terrence Rodriguez
SSS authorized live rounds
Corporate will use collective punishment to force his surrender
He's now a fugitive hiding in maintenance tunnels
His operation is destroyed
Maya is running clinic under lockdown conditions
Lin fought on the front lines
People died believing in what he built
Wright warned him it would end in massacre
Nico Chen.emotional_state: Initially terrified, then devastated by casualties, ultimately transforming to cold focused rage
Nico Chen.physical_state: Hiding in maintenance tunnels, exhausted, comm off except emergency frequency
Nico Chen.current_resources: Unknown credit status (likely frozen), no buildings under his control, SSS occupation of district, in hiding
Nico Chen.relationships_changed: Realizes people fought for him specifically, sees their sacrifice as mandate to continue
Nico Chen.key_realization: People died for dignity, not just free meals - this is bigger than him now, wars don't end with surrender
Nico Chen.status: Fugitive king, wanted by SSS, hiding in tunnels, planning resistance rather than surrender
Nico Chen.transformation: From fugitive to rebel - cold rage replacing exhaustion and guilt

knows: Got Nico off the streets minutes after shooting started
Knows hidden routes through maintenance tunnels
Sees the riot as assertion of dignity, not just violence
Corporate will use collective punishment
Nico needs to honor the dead by continuing to fight
They still have favors and people who owe them
Kade Rivera.emotional_state: Protective, pragmatic, fierce about defending dignity of those who died
Kade Rivera.physical_state: Guiding Nico through tunnels, knows safe spots
Kade Rivera.status: In hiding with Nico, acting as guide and counsel
Kade Rivera.philosophy: The dead deserve a king who keeps fighting, not one who gives up
Kade Rivera.commitment: Ready to help build an army for resistance

knows: Clinic overwhelmed with casualties in first hour
Terrence Rodriguez died in surgery from femoral artery gunshot
SSS doing door-to-door searches with thermal scanners
Corporate threatening collective punishment
Running clinic under lockdown conditions
Nico still in district and being hunted
Maya Torres.emotional_state: Coordinating triage under impossible conditions, frightened for Nico
Maya Torres.status: Operating under SSS lockdown, voice shaking reporting casualties

knows: This riot was always coming once Nico gave people hope
Corporate has been killing Level 8 slowly for decades
The difference is now it's fast enough to notice
People are fighting for dignity and the life Nico showed them was possible
This is bigger than Nico now
Lin Zhao.emotional_state: Fierce, fighting on front lines despite age, clear-eyed about inevitability
Lin Zhao.physical_state: On front lines with metal pipe, fighting like she's 30 years younger
Lin Zhao.philosophy: People were always dying - Nico just gave them something worth dying for

knows: Nico could have prevented riot by calling people off (believes)
Arrest warrants for 47 people in the operation
Crowd of thousands defending Nico
Someone threw improvised explosive, took out front rank
Had to authorize live rounds and weapons free
47 casualties confirmed
Nico still in district, searching door-to-door
Considering collective punishment to force surrender
Commander James Wright.emotional_state: Cold, calculating, blaming Nico for deaths, authorizing escalating violence
Commander James Wright.status: Authorized lethal force, leading manhunt for Nico
Commander James Wright.quote: How many casualties is a free meal worth?
Commander James Wright.strategy: Collective punishment until Nico is handed over

revealed_to_reader: SSS raided at dawn with 60+ officers in full tactical gear
Arrest warrants for 47 people involved in Nico's operation
Charges: fraud, tax evasion, criminal conspiracy, 20 years mandatory
Thousands of Level 8 residents fought back spontaneously
Riot lasted 6 hours before SSS reinforcements pushed crowd back
47 confirmed dead including Mrs. Huang (70, trampled) and Terrence Rodriguez (19, gunshot)
SSS used concussion grenades, tear gas, shock batons, then live rounds
Someone in crowd threw improvised explosive, took out front SSS rank
Wright authorized lethal force after explosive
Nico watched from street, crowd shielded him with their bodies
Kade pulled Nico into tunnels while riot continued
Maya coordinating triage at overwhelmed clinic
Lin fought on front lines with metal pipe
SSS occupation of entire district, no one in or out
Corporate threatening collective punishment until Nico surrenders
Nico transformed from guilt to cold focused rage
Planning to build 'an army' for continued resistance

planted.element: Nico planning to build an army
planted.significance: Transition from charity to organized resistance
Names and stories fuel broader labor movement
Building organizing infrastructure independent of Nico

planted.element: Nico as fugitive king in tunnels
planted.significance: Can't appear publicly, must operate in hiding

planted.element: Wright's question: 'How many casualties is a free meal worth?'
planted.significance: Central moral question of the trilogy

active_tensions: Nico is fugitive in tunnels, SSS hunting with thermal scanners
47 dead need to be honored by continuing fight or their deaths were meaningless
Operation destroyed but infrastructure (people, relationships) intact
Nico transformed from charity worker to revolutionary
Wright blaming Nico for deaths Nico blames himself for
How to resist without causing more deaths?
Kade pushing Nico to keep fighting, be the king people died for
world_changes: Level 8 Jade District under SSS occupation and lockdown
Thousands of residents fought SSS for 6 hours
Lethal force authorized and used against civilians
Level 8 residents have asserted themselves violently against Corporate
Precedent set: people will fight to defend dignity

casualties.name: Mrs. Huang
casualties.role: Morning shift worker at noodle house for 2 years

casualties.name: Terrence Rodriguez
casualties.role: Youth center volunteer, taught kids to code
casualties.death: Gunshot to femoral artery, died in surgery

notes: Third tentpole of Book 2 (MIDPOINT REVERSAL). Everything changes. SSS raid triggers spontaneous mass resistance, resulting in massacre. Nico transitions from charity provider trying to comply with Corporate to fugitive revolutionary. Key theme: People didn't die for free meals, they died for dignity and the hope Nico showed them. The riot had its own momentum - stopped being about Nico and became about collective assertion of humanity. Character development: Nico's transformation from guilt to cold rage, Kade as fierce defender of the dead's dignity, Lin fighting despite age, Maya under impossible pressure, Wright authorizing violence and blaming Nico. The King becomes the Rebel. Operation destroyed but revolutionary potential born. Sets up second half of Book 2: Nico in hiding, building resistance, planning next moves. Arc position 0.62 - major transformation under extreme trauma.
